easy connection: - Simply touching an NFC-compatible smartphone / tablet to the camera, or scanning the QR code connects to Wi-Fi.
easy share: - Instantly upload and share images on social media using the Panasonic Image App on a smartphone or tablet.
geotagging: - Tag location information to the image by utilizing the GPS log of a smartphone / tablet and share it to the preferred social media.
smartphone enabled remote shooting remo: - With the Panasonic Image App, you can utilize a smartphone or tablet as a remote controller to zoom, set the focus and shoot from a distance.
